tfg.uo.lightpen.business.impl.networking.networktools

Class ARPInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • tfg.uo.lightpen.business.impl.networking.networktools.ARPInfo

  • public class ARPInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    **** DISCLAIMER ***** This is part of the AndroidNetworkTools library created by the user stealthcopter that can be found here: https://github.com/stealthcopter/AndroidNetworkTools We just integrated the source into our project to reuse part of their functionalities ********************* Created by mat on 09/12/15. Looks at the file at /proc/net/arp to fromIPAddress ip/mac addresses from the cache We assume that the file has this structure: IP address HW type Flags HW address Mask Device 192.168.18.11 0x1 0x2 00:04:20:06:55:1a * eth0 192.168.18.36 0x1 0x2 00:22:43:ab:2a:5b * eth0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllIPAddressesInARPCache()
      Returns all the ip addresses currently in the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllIPAndMACAddressesInARPCache()
      Returns all the IP/MAC address pairs currently in the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllMACAddressesInARPCache()
      Returns all the MAC addresses currently in the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
      static java.lang.String getIPAddressFromMAC(java.lang.String macAddress)
      Try to extract a IP address from the given MAC address using the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
      static java.lang.String getMACFromIPAddress(java.lang.String ip)
      Try to extract a hardware MAC address from a given IP address using the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getMACFromIPAddress

        public static java.lang.String getMACFromIPAddress(java.lang.String ip)
        Try to extract a hardware MAC address from a given IP address using the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
        Parameters:
        ip - - IP address to search for
        Returns:
        the MAC from the ARP cache or null in format "01:23:45:67:89:ab"

      • getIPAddressFromMAC

        public static java.lang.String getIPAddressFromMAC(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Try to extract a IP address from the given MAC address using the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
        Parameters:
        macAddress - in format "01:23:45:67:89:ab" to search for
        Returns:
        the IP address found or null in format "192.168.0.1"

      • getAllIPAddressesInARPCache

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllIPAddressesInARPCache()
        Returns all the ip addresses currently in the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
        Returns:
        list of IP addresses found

      • getAllMACAddressesInARPCache

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllMACAddressesInARPCache()
        Returns all the MAC addresses currently in the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
        Returns:
        list of MAC addresses found

      • getAllIPAndMACAddressesInARPCache

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllIPAndMACAddressesInARPCache()
        Returns all the IP/MAC address pairs currently in the ARP cache (/proc/net/arp).
        Returns:
        list of IP/MAC address pairs found
